mapper.update:
update study_info
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
study_type_id = #{studyTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school_name = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_date = #{inDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
graduation_date = #{graduationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
degree = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
certificate = #{certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_date = #{delDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pro_name = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xz = #{xz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
get_method = #{getMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
add_date = #{addDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update study_info set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, study_type_id = #{studyTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school_name = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_date = #{inDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, graduation_date = #{graduationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, degree = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certificate = #{certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_date = #{delDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pro_name = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xz = #{xz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, get_method = #{getMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_date = #{addDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, major = #{major,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, uid, study_type_id, school_name, STR_TO_DATE(in_date,'%Y-%m-%d') in_date, STR_TO_DATE(graduation_date,'%Y-%m-%d') graduation_date, education, degree, certificate , del_date, pro_name, xz , get_method, activity_id, major from study_info where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
